headlines.description: Paul Pogba scored twice, with Anthony Martial also on target as Manchester United beat Fulham 3-0 at Craven Cottage.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pogba, Martial on target as United beat Fulham

events.name: West Ham United at Crystal Palace

headlines.description: Wilfried Zaha's deflected goal earned Crystal Palace a 1-1 draw at home to fellow Londoners West Ham United in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zaha earns Palace a point at home to West Ham

headlines.description: Arsenal picked up only their fifth away win of the season with a 2-1 victory at lowly Huddersfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lacazette strikes as Arsenal beat Huddersfield

headlines.description: Jurgen Klopp's men came into this match off top spot for the first time since December as they dropped to second on goal difference.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool back on top with win over B'mouth

headlines.description: Cardiff City's Kenneth Zohore struck deep into stoppage time to secure a crucial 2-1 win on Saturday away to fellow strugglers Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cardiff beat Southampton in thrilling finish

headlines.description: Substitute Andre Gray scored a second-half winner as Watford beat Marco Silva's Everton 1-0 to heap the pressure on their former manager.
headlines.shortLinkText: Everton's Silva under pressure with Watford loss

headlines.description: Chris Wood helped Burnley earn a 3-1 victory over Brighton & Hove Albion on Saturday, a win that steered Burnley three points clear of relegation.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley earn win at Brighton to move clear of bottom three
